answers.author: Richard Tripp
answers.text:
Steve, Our firm has worked  in conjunction with a consulting group to review these items as well as station locations and overall coverage.
If you would like to find out more you can contact me at rtripp@msaarch.com.
Thank you
Rick Tripp

answers.text:
Steve,  our firm specializes in Executive Search, Management Studies and Consulting Services.   We have consultants on staff with Public Safety Backgrounds qualified to conduct the study.  For more information view our website or contact me direct at mikehosking@comcast. net

answers.author: Leonard Matarese
answers.text:
Steve, your ICMA Center for Public Safety Management provides technical assistance and consulting services in all areas of  police, fire, EMS and Emergency Management. Click on the Results Network tab at the top of this screen and you'll be sent to our website. Your Association provides an "honest broker" analysis to our members. When you go to that site you will see the dozens of communities we have assisted this year alone.

author: Steve Corbitt
text:
The City of Ashland, KY is looking for a qualified Fire Department consultant to review and annalize the pilicies, proceedures and pracitces of the Fire Department.
Ashland population: 22,000
24 hour paid Fire Department w/ 55 employees.
Steve Corbitt
City Manager
title: Fire Department consultant
